ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Just as We sent down punishment on the dissectors,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Like (those) We had sent to those schismatics who slandered their Books
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: even as We had sent warning to those who had divided their religion into fragments;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (We have given you the Quran) as We had given (the Bible) to those who divided themselves into groups
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: (Of a punishment) Like the one We sent down upon the dividers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: As We have sent down on the Muqtasimin (conspiring confederates),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Like as We sent down on the dividers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So We sent it down to the partitioners,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Such as We send down for those who make division,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: such as We send down for those who are divisive,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Even as We sent down on the dividers -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: like that We sent down upon those who split into bands,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Of just such wrath) as We sent down on those who divided (Scripture into arbitrary parts),-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: As We have sent down on the dividers, (Quraish pagans or Jews and Christians).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So We sent it down to the partitioners,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Just as We sent down to the separatists.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:90] Even as We sent down, chastisement, on those who make division, the Jews and the Christians,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Such as We send down) on the Day of Badr (for those who make division) the folk who were slain in the valley, i.e. Abu Jahl Ibn Hisham, al-Walid Ibn al-Mughirah al-Makhzumi, Hanzalah Ibn Abi Sufyan and 'Utbah and Shaybah the sons of Rabi'ah as well as all their companions who were killed at Badr,
